verses.roman:
itaretara 'ca' diyā samāsa kariye
'āṭānna' bāra ātmārāma nāma la-iye

synonyms: itaretara—in different varieties; ca—the word ca; diyā—adding; samāsa kariye—make a compound word; āṭānna bāra—fifty-eight times; ātmārāma—the ātmārāma devotees; nāma la-iye—I take their different names.
translation: "In this way, as I add the word ca to one word after another, I make a compound. Thus the different names of ātmārāmas can be taken fifty-eight times.
